name: CVE-2020-1046
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Microsoft .NET Framework processes input, aka '.NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:2.0:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:3.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1607:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2016:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1709:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1803:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1903:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1909:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2016:1909:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2016:2004:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:3.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:4.7.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2019:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1809:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:3.5.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
